description:
After QUARTET NIGHT`s masterful performance, STARISH rushes onto the stage they`ve dreamed of performing on to challenge their rivals and deliver their voices to the world. Together the idol groups STARISH and QUARTET NIGHT have started a revolution of love, but an unexpected development waits for them in the final moments of the concert...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: マジLOVEレボリューションズ
